title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

  • Scratchwork” can be ignored; the use of a variable other than x MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG4baaaa@39F9@ is acceptable.

  • Domain restrictions are not required to be included and are not scored.

  • Where applicable, answers that have not been evaluated according to bullets 2 and 3 in the Directions do not earn the point.

  • To earn the point in (i), use of “ log MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaciGGSbGaai4BaiaacEgaaaa@3BCC@ ” rather than “ log 10 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D6D@ ” is acceptable.

  • A logarithmic expression that is missing one or both parentheses around the full argument of the logarithm is still eligible to earn the point.

  • If a response is presented as a complex fraction, the complex fraction must be unambiguous in structure. Parentheses must be used correctly, and/or the fraction bars must be clearly and correctly proportioned.
descriptions:
The student response includes none of these criteria.

  • Expression for j (x) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGQbGaaGjcVlaacIcacaWG4bGaaiykaaaa@3DD2@ with supporting work. NOTE: j (x)= log 10   ( 4 x ) 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4920@ is acceptable with supporting work.

  • Expression for k(x) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGRbGaaiikaiaadIhacaGGPaaaaa@3C42@ with supporting work.

  • Two components. One of the following:

    • Correct expression in (i) without supporting work

    • Expression in (i) is reported as log 10  ( 8 x 5 ⋅2 x 2 x 9 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@501E@ . No incorrect work follows.

    • Expression in (i) is reported as log 10  ( 16 x 7 x 9 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4607@ . No incorrect work follows.

    • Expression in (i) is reported as 2 log 10  ( 4 x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4318@ . No incorrect work follows.

    • Expression in (i) is reported as − log 10 ( x 2 16 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4367@ . No incorrect work follows.

    • Expression in (i) is reported as −2 log 10  ( x 4 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4405@ . No incorrect work follows.

    • Expression in (i) is reported using natural logarithm OR any of the five expressions shown in the previous bullets are presented with the natural logarithm

      AND One of the following:

    • Correct expression in (ii) without supporting work

    • Expression in (ii) is reported as cos x sin x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@43CA@ OR cot x MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaciGGJbGaai4BaiaacshacaaMe8UaamiEaaaa@3E5A@ . No incorrect work follows.

    • Expression in (ii) includes a correct application of a Pythagorean identity with no incorrect work.

The student response includes one of these criteria.

NOTE: j (x)= log 10   ( 4 x ) 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4920@ is acceptable with supporting work.

  • Expression for k(x) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGRbGaaiikaiaadIhacaGGPaaaaa@3C42@ with supporting work.

  • Two components. One of the following:

    • Correct expression in (i) without supporting work

    • Expression in (i) is reported as log 10  ( 8 x 5 ⋅2 x 2 x 9 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@501E@ . No incorrect work follows.

    • Expression in (i) is reported as log 10  ( 16 x 7 x 9 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4607@ . No incorrect work follows.

    • Expression in (i) is reported as 2 log 10  ( 4 x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4318@ . No incorrect work follows.

    • Expression in (i) is reported as − log 10 ( x 2 16 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4367@ . No incorrect work follows.

    • Expression in (i) is reported using natural logarithm OR any of the five expressions shown in the previous bullets are presented with the natural logarithm

      AND One of the following:

    • Correct expression in (ii) without supporting work

    • Expression in (ii) is reported as cos x sin x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@43CA@ OR cot x MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaciGGJbGaai4BaiaacshacaaMe8UaamiEaaaa@3E5A@ . No incorrect work follows.

    • Expression in (ii) includes a correct application of a Pythagorean identity with no incorrect work.

The student response includes both of these criteria.
